description: NPN-equivalence classes of switching functions of exactly n variables.
references: S. Muroga, Threshold Logic and Its Applications. Wiley, NY, 1971, p. 38, Table 2.3.2. - Row 17.
S. Muroga, I. Toda and M. Kondo, Majority decision functions of up to six variables, Math. Comp., 16 (1962), 459-472.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. O. Winder, Enumeration of seven-argument threshold functions, IEEE Trans. Electron. Computers, 14 (1965), 315-.
links: Goto, Eiichi, and Hidetosi Takahasi, Some Theorems Useful in Threshold Logic for Enumerating Boolean Functions, in Proceedings International Federation for Information Processing (IFIP) Congress, 1962, pp. 747-752. [Annotated scans of certain pages]
